name: src/CommandArray.js
CommandArray
description:
The command array accepts a sequence of functions and invokes them in order.
It is intended to replace a standard array that is used to enqueue functions
to be invoked once GPT is loaded.

params.name: commands
params.description: The commands to execute

name: push
description: Executes the sequence of functions specified in the arguments in order.

unknown.tagValue:
{number} The number of commands processed so far. This is
compatible with {@link Array#push}'s return value (the current length of the array).

params.name: f
params.description: A JavaScript function to be executed.

return.description:
The number of commands processed so far. This is
compatible with {@link Array#push}'s return value (the current length of the array).

name: src/CompanionAdsService.js
CompanionAdsService
description: Companion Ads service. This service is used by video ads to show companion ads.

params.name: gpt
params.description: The containing {@link GPT} instance.

name: enableSyncLoading
description:
Enables the service implementation to be loaded synchronously. This needs
to be called before {@link GPT#enableServices}.

Note: this call can be only used if gpt.js is also loaded synchronously,
for example, by using a script element. If called when {@link GPT} is loaded
asynchronously, the outcome of the loading is undefined.

name: setRefreshUnfilledSlots
description:
Sets whether companion slots that have not been filled will be automatically
backfilled. Only slots that are also registered with the {@link PubAdsService} will
be backfilled. This method can be called multiple times during the page's
lifetime to turn backfill on and off.

params.name: value
params.description:
true to automatically backfill unfilled slots,
false to leave them unchanged.

name: src/ContentService.js
ContentService
description: The content service. This service is used to set the content of a slot manually.

params.name: gpt
params.description: The containing {@link GPT} instance.

name: setContent
description:
Fills a slot with the given content. If services are not yet enabled,
stores the content and fills it in when services are enabled.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot to be filled.

params.name: content
params.description: The HTML content for the slot.

name: src/GPT.js
GPT
description:
This is the global namespace that the {@link GPT} uses for its API.

For details on this API, see https://developers.google.com/doubleclick-gpt/reference.

Note that the recommended way of handling async is to use {@link GPT#cmd} to
queue callbacks for when {@link GPT} is ready. These callbacks do not have to check
{@link GPT#apiReady} as they are guaranteed to execute once the API is set up.

The {@link GPT#cmd} variable is initialized to an empty JavaScript array by
the GPT tag syntax on the page, and cmd.push is the standard Array.push
method that adds an element to the end of the array. When the {@link GPT} JavaScript
is loaded, it looks through the array and executes all the functions in
order. The script then replaces cmd with a {@link CommandArray} object
whose push method is defined to execute the function argument passed to it.
This mechanism allows {@link GPT} to reduce perceived latency by fetching the
JavaScript asynchronously while allowing the browser to continue rendering
the page.

params.name: version
params.description: The version to emulate.

name: apiReady
description:
Flag indicating that {@link GPT} API is loaded and ready to be called.
This property will be simply undefined until the API is ready.

name: pubadsReady
description:
Flag indicating that {@link PubAdsService} is enabled, loaded and fully
operational.

This property will be simply `undefined` until {@link GPT#enableServices()}
is called and {@link PubAdsService} is loaded and initialized.

name: cmd
description:
Reference to the global command queue for asynchronous execution of
{@link GPT}-related calls.

name: getVersion
description: Returns the current version of {@link GPT}.

return.description: Version string.

name: companionAds
description: Returns a reference to the {@link CompanionAdsService}.

return.description: Instance of the {@link CompanionAdsService}.

name: content
description: Returns a reference to the {@link ContentService}.

return.description: Instance of the {@link ContentService}.

name: pubads
description: Returns a reference to the {@link PubAdsService}.

return.description: Instance of the {@link PubAdsService}.

name: enableServices
description: Enables all {@link GPT} services that have been defined for ad slots on the page.

return.description: A new builder.

name: defineSlot
description:
Constructs an ad slot with a given ad unit path and size and associates it
with the ID of a div element on the page that will contain the ad.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: Full path of the ad unit with the network code and unit code.

params.name: size
params.description:
Width and height of the added slot. This is the
size that is used in the ad request if no responsive size mapping is provided
or the size of the viewport is smaller than the smallest size provided in the mapping.

params.name: optDiv
params.description: ID of the div that will contain this ad unit.

return.description: The newly created slot.

name: defineOutOfPageSlot
description:
Constructs an out-of-page (interstitial) ad slot with the given ad unit path.
optDiv is the ID of the div element that will contain the ad.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: Full path of the ad unit with the network code and ad unit code.

params.name: optDiv
params.description: ID of the div that will contain this ad unit.

return.description: The newly created slot.

name: destroySlots
description:
Destroys the given slots, removes all related objects and references of
given slots from {@link GPT}. This API does not support passback slots and
companion slots. Calling this API clears the ad and removes the slot object
from the internal state maintained by {@link GPT}. Calling any more functions on
that slot object will result in undefined behaviour. Note the browser may
still not free the memory associated with that slot if a reference to it is
maintained by the publisher page. Calling this API makes the div associated
with that slot available for reuse.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if slots have been destroyed, false otherwise.

params.name: optSlots
params.description:
The array of slots to
destroy. Array is optional; all slots will be destroyed if it is unspecified.

return.description: true if slots have been destroyed, false otherwise.

name: display
description:
Instructs slot services to render the slot. Each ad slot should only be
displayed once per page. All slots must be defined and have a service
associated with them before being displayed. The display call must not
happen until the element is present in the DOM. The usual way to achieve
that is to place it within a script block within the div element named in
the method call.

If single request architecture (SRA) is being used, all unfetched ad slots
at the moment display is called will be fetched in a single instance of
{@link GPT#display}. To force an ad slot not to display, the entire div
must be removed.

params.name: div
params.description: ID of the div element containing the ad slot.

name: setAdIframeTitle
description:
Sets that title for all ad container iframes created by {@link PubAdsService},
from this point onwards.

params.name: title
params.description: The title to set.

params.name: service
params.description: The service to add

return.description: The service added

params.name: slot
params.description: The {@link Slot} to add.

return.description: The {@link Slot} added.

params.name: slot
params.description: The {@link Slot} to remove.

name: _loaded
description:
Tells the {@link GPT} service that it has finished loading.  This method
MUST be called in order for most of the rest of the library to function.

name: src/GeneralSize.js
GeneralSize
description: Represents either a [W, H] {@link SingleSize}, {@link NamedSize} or {@link MultiSize}.

name: isGeneralSize
description: Returns true if the given object is a {@link GeneralSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: toSizes
description: Returns an array of {@link Size} instances from the {@link GeneralSize}.

unknown.tagValue:
{Array<Size>} The {@link Size} instances or empty array if the object
is not a {@link GeneralSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to convert.

return.description:
The {@link Size} instances or empty array if the object
is not a {@link GeneralSize}.

name: src/MultiSize.js
isMultiSize
description: Returns true if the given object is a {@link MultiSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: toSizes
description: Returns an array of {@link Size} instances from the {@link MultiSize}.

unknown.tagValue:
{Array<Size>} The {@link Size} instances or empty array if the object
is not a {@link MultiSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to convert.

return.description:
The {@link Size} instances or empty array if the object
is not a {@link MultiSize}.

name: src/NamedSize.js
content:
/**
 * Named sizes that a slot can have. In most cases size is a fixed-size rectangle
 * but there are some cases when we need other kinds of size specifications.
 *
 * Only the following are valid named sizes:
 * * 'fluid': the ad container takes 100% width of parent div and then resizes
 *   its height to fit creative content. Similar to how regular block elements
 *   on a page behave. Used for native ads (see related article
 *   https://support.google.com/dfp_premium/answer/6366905).
 *
 * @typedef {string} NamedSize
 * @private
 */

/**
 * Returns true if the given object is a {@link NamedSize}.
 *
 * @private
 * @param {NamedSize|*} obj The object to test
 */
export function isNamedSize(obj) {
  return obj === 'fluid';
}

name: NamedSize
description:
Named sizes that a slot can have. In most cases size is a fixed-size rectangle
but there are some cases when we need other kinds of size specifications.

Only the following are valid named sizes:
* 'fluid': the ad container takes 100% width of parent div and then resizes
  its height to fit creative content. Similar to how regular block elements
  on a page behave. Used for native ads (see related article
  https://support.google.com/dfp_premium/answer/6366905).

name: isNamedSize
description: Returns true if the given object is a {@link NamedSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: src/PubAdsService.js
PubAdsService
description:
Publisher Ads service. This service is used to fetch and show ads from your
{@link DFP} account.

params.name: gt
params.description: The containing {@link GPT} instance.

name: refresh
description:
Fetches and displays new ads for specific or all slots on the page.
Works only in asynchronous rendering mode.

For proper behavior across all browsers, calling refresh must be preceded
by a call to display the ad slot. If the call to display is omitted, refresh
may behave unexpectedly. If desired, the {@link PubAdsService#disableInitialLoad} method can be
used to stop display from fetching an ad.

params.name: optSlots
params.description:
The slots to refresh. Array is optional;
all slots will be refreshed if it is unspecified.

params.name: optOptions
params.description:
Configuration options
associated with this refresh call. changeCorrelator specifies whether or
not a new correlator is to be generated for fetching ads. Our ad servers
maintain this correlator value briefly (currently for 30 seconds, but
subject to change), such that requests with the same correlator received
close together will be considered a single page view. By default a new
correlator is generated for every refresh.

name: clear
description:
Removes the ads from the given slots and replaces them with blank
content. The slots will be marked as unfetched.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} Returns true if slots have been cleared, false otherwise.

params.name: optSlots
params.description:
The array of slots to clear. Array is
optional; all slots will be cleared if it is unspecified.

return.description: Returns true if slots have been cleared, false otherwise.

name: defineOutOfPagePassback
description:
Constructs an out-of-page passback slot. A passback is where a {@link GPT} snippet
is used as a creative in an ad serving system. The ad serving system could
be {@link DFP} or a third party. In this case, the ads are always requested
synchronously in non-single request mode.

unknown.tagValue:
{?Slot} The new passback object or null if the method was
called with invalid arguments.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: The ad unit path of the slot to use as a passback.

return.description:
The new passback object or null if the method was
called with invalid arguments.

name: definePassback
description:
Constructs a passback slot. A passback is where a {@link GPT} snippet is used as a
creative in an ad serving system. The ad serving system could be {@link DFP} or a
third party. In this case, the ads are always requested synchronously in
non-single request mode.

unknown.tagValue:
{?Slot} The new passback object or null if the method was
called with invalid arguments.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: The ad unit path of the slot to use as a passback.

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the slot.

return.description:
The new passback object or null if the method was
called with invalid arguments.

name: disableInitialLoad
description:
Disables requests for ads on page load, but allows ads to be requested with
a {@link PubAdsService#refresh} call. This should be set prior to enabling
the service. Async mode must be used; otherwise it will be impossible to
request ads using {@link PubAdsService#refresh}.

name: enableAsyncRendering
description:
Enables async rendering mode to enable non-blocking fetching and rendering
of ads. Because the service uses asynchronous rendering by default, you
only need to use this method to override a previous setting. Async mode
must be set before the service is enabled.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} Returns true if async rendering mode was enabled and
false if it is impossible to enable async rendering mode because the method
was called after the service was enabled.

return.description:
Returns true if async rendering mode was enabled and
false if it is impossible to enable async rendering mode because the method
was called after the service was enabled.

name: enableSingleRequest
description:
Enables single request mode for fetching multiple ads at the same time.
This requires all pubads slots to be defined and added to the {@link PubAdsService}
prior to enabling the service. Single request mode must be set
before the service is enabled.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} Returns true if single request mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable single request mode because the method was
called after the service was enabled.

return.description:
Returns true if single request mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable single request mode because the method was
called after the service was enabled.

name: enableSyncRendering
description:
Enables sync rendering mode to enable blocking fetching and rendering of ads.
This mode must be set before the service is enabled. Synchronous rendering
also requires that the {@link GPT} JavaScript be loaded synchronously.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} Returns true if sync rendering mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable sync rendering mode because the method was
called after the service was enabled.

return.description:
Returns true if sync rendering mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable sync rendering mode because the method was
called after the service was enabled.

name: enableVideoAds
description:
Signals to {@link GPT} that video ads will be present on the page. This enables
competitive exclusion constraints on display and video ads. If the video
content is known, call setVideoContent in order to be able to use content
exclusion for display ads.

name: setTargeting
description:
Sets custom targeting parameters for a given key that apply to all pubads
service ad slots. Calling this multiple times for the same key will
overwrite old values. These keys are defined in your {@link DFP} account.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: key
params.description: Targeting parameter key.

params.name: value
params.description: Targeting parameter value or array of values.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: getTargeting
description: Returns a specific custom service-level targeting parameter that has been set.

unknown.tagValue:
{!Array<string>} The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

params.name: key
params.description: The targeting key to look for.

return.description:
The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

name: getTargetingKeys
description: Returns the list of all custom service-level targeting keys that have been set.

unknown.tagValue: {!Array<string>} Array of targeting keys. Ordering is undefined.

return.description: Array of targeting keys. Ordering is undefined.

name: clearTargeting
description: Clears custom targeting parameters for a given key.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: key
params.description: Targeting parameter key.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: collapseEmptyDivs
description:
Enables collapsing of slot divs so that they don't take up any space on the
page when there is no ad content to display. This mode must be set before
the service is enabled.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} Returns true if div collapse mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable collapse mode because the method was called
after the service was enabled.

params.name: optCollapseBeforeAdFetch
params.description:
Whether to collapse the slots
even before the ads are fetched. This parameter is optional; if not
provided, false will be used as the default value.

return.description:
Returns true if div collapse mode was enabled and false
if it is impossible to enable collapse mode because the method was called
after the service was enabled.

name: setCategoryExclusion
description: Sets a page-level ad category exclusion for the given label name.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: categoryExclusion
params.description: The ad category exclusion label to add.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: clearCategoryExclusions
description:
Clears all page-level ad category exclusion labels.
This is useful if you want to refresh the slot.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setCentering
description:
Enables/disables centering of ads. This mode must be set before the service
is enabled. Centering is disabled by default.

params.name: centerAds
params.description: true to center ads, false to left-align them.

name: setCookieOptions
description: Sets cookie options for GPT on the page.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: options
params.description:
The cookie options to set. Set the options parameter
to the integer value 1 to ignore cookies, and to 0 to use cookies.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setForceSafeFrame
description:
Configures whether all ads on the page should be forced to be rendered using
a SafeFrame container.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the function was called.

params.name: forceSafeFrame
params.description:
true to force all ads on the page to be
rendered in SafeFrames and false to change the previous setting to false.
Setting this to false when unspecified earlier, won't change anything.

return.description: The service object on which the function was called.

name: setLocation
description:
Passes location information from websites so you can geo-target line items
to specific locations. {@link DFP} will not use location data unless this feature
has been enabled for your network.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: latitudeOrAddress
params.description: Latitude or freeform address.

params.name: optLongitude
params.description: The longitude (if a latitude was provided as first argument).

params.name: optRadius
params.description:
The radius in millimeters. Will be rounded to closest integer.
Only used when passing the latitude and longitude.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setPublisherProvidedId
description: Sets the value for the publisher-provided ID.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: ppid
params.description:
An alphanumeric ID provided by the publisher with a
recommended maximum of 150 characters.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setSafeFrameConfig
description:
Sets the page-level preferences for SafeFrame configuration. Any
unrecognized keys in the config object will be ignored. The entire config
will be ignored if an invalid value is passed for a recognized key. These
page level preferences will be overriden by slot level preferences, if
specified.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: config
params.description: The configuration object.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setTagForChildDirectedTreatment
description: Configures whether the page should be treated as child-directed.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: value
params.description:
The child-directed treatment tag status to set. Set
the options parameter to the integer value 1 to mark the ad request as
child-directed, and to 0 for ad requests that are not child-directed.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: clearTagForChildDirectedTreatment
description: Clears the configuration for whether the page should be treated as child-directed.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the method was called.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: setVideoContent
description:
Sets the video content information to be sent along with the ad requests for
targeting and content exclusion purposes. Video ads will be automatically
enabled when this method is called. For videoContentId and videoCmsId, use
the values that are provided to the {@link DFP} content ingestion service.

params.name: videoContentId
params.description: The video content ID.

params.name: videoCmsId
params.description: The video CMS ID.

name: updateCorrelator
description:
Changes the correlator that is sent with ad requests, effectively starting
a new page view. The correlator is the same for all the ad requests coming
from one page view, and unique across page views. Only applies to async mode.

unknown.tagValue: {PubAdsService} The service object on which the function was called.

return.description: The service object on which the function was called.

name: _unlessEnabled
description:
Conditionally execute a function unless the service has already been
enabled.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} true if the function was called; false if the service has
already been enabled.

params.name: fn
params.description: The function to call if the service is not enabled

return.description:
true if the function was called; false if the service has
already been enabled.

name: setRequestNonPersonalizedAds
description: Configures whether the page should request personalized or non-personalized ads. Personalized ads served by default.

params.name: nonPersonalizedAds
params.description: 0 for personalized ads, 1 for non-personalized ads.

name: src/ResponseInformation.js

params.name: advertiserId
params.description: The ID of the advertiser.

params.name: campaignId
params.description: The ID of the campaign.

params.name: lineItemId
params.description: The ID of the line item.

params.name: creativeId
params.description: The ID of the creative.

params.name: labelIds
params.description: The label IDs of the creative.

name: lineItemId
description: The ID of the line item.

name: labelIds
description: The label IDs of the creative.

name: src/SafeFrameConfig.js

params.name: allowOverlayExpansion
params.description: true to allow expansion by overlay and false otherwise.

params.name: allowPushExpansion
params.description: true to allow expansion by push and false otherwise.

params.name: sandbox
params.description:
true if SafeFrame should use the HTML5 sandbox
attribute to prevent top level navigation.

name: allowOverlayExpansion
description: true to allow expansion by overlay and false otherwise.

name: allowPushExpansion
description: true to allow expansion by push and false otherwise.

name: sandbox
description:
true if SafeFrame should use the HTML5 sandbox
attribute to prevent top level navigation. The only valid value is true (cannot
be forced to false). Note that the sandbox attribute disables plugins (e.g. Flash)
and creatives that attempt to navigate the top level page instead of opening
in a new window.

name: src/Service.js
Service
description: Base service class that contains methods common for all services.

params.name: gpt
params.description: The containing {@link GPT} instance.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the service

name: getName
description: Returns the name of the service.

return.description: The name of the service
The version string.

name: getSlots
description: Returns the slots with this service enabled.

return.description: The slots

name: _addSlot
description: Adds the given slot to this service.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot to add

name: _removeSlot
description: Removes the given slot from the service.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot to remove

name: getSlotIdMap
description: Returns a map of IDs to slots.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} The map of IDs to slots.

return.description: The map of IDs to slots.

name: addEventListener
description:
Registers a listener that allows you to set up and call a JavaScript
function when a specific {@link GPT} event happens on the page. The following
events are supported:
* googletag.events.ImpressionViewableEvent
* googletag.events.SlotOnloadEvent
* googletag.events.SlotRenderEndedEvent
* googletag.events.SlotVisibilityChangedEvent

An object of the appropriate event type is passed to the listener when it is called.

unknown.tagValue: {Service} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: eventType
params.description:
A string representing the type of event generated
by GPT. Event types are case sensitive.

params.name: listener
params.description: Function that takes a single event object argument.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: _fireEvent
description:
Fires the specified eventType, calling all registered listeners with the
specified event object.

params.name: eventType
params.description: The event type to fire.

params.name: event
params.description: The event object to pass to listeners.

name: get
description: Returns the value for the AdSense attribute associated with the given key.

unknown.tagValue:
{?string} Current value for the attribute key, or null if the key
is not present

params.name: key
params.description: Name of the attribute to look for.

return.description:
Current value for the attribute key, or null if the key
is not present

name: getAttributeKeys
description: Returns the attribute keys that have been set on this service.

unknown.tagValue:
{!Array<string>} Array of attribute keys set on this service.
Ordering is undefined.

return.description:
Array of attribute keys set on this service.
Ordering is undefined.

name: set
description:
Sets values for AdSense attributes that apply to all ad slots under the
publisher ads service. See AdSense Attributes for a list of available keys
and values. Calling this more than once for the same key will override
previously set values for that key. All values must be set before the
first display call.

unknown.tagValue: {Service} The service object on which the method was called.

params.name: key
params.description: The name of the attribute.

params.name: value
params.description: Attribute value.

return.description: The service object on which the method was called.

name: display
description:
Constructs and displays an ad slot with the given ad unit path and size.
This method does not work with single request mode.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: Ad unit path of slot to be rendered.

params.name: size
params.description: Width and height of the slot.

params.name: optDiv
params.description: ID of the div containing the slot.

params.name: optClickUrl
params.description: The click URL to use on this slot.

name: src/SingleSize.js
isSingleSize
description: Returns true if the given object is a {@link SingleSize}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: toSize
description: Returns a {@link Size} instance from the {@link SingleSize}.

unknown.tagValue: {?Size} The {@link Size} instance or null if the object is not a {@link SingleSizeArray}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to convert.

return.description: The {@link Size} instance or null if the object is not a {@link SingleSizeArray}.

name: src/SingleSizeArray.js
SingleSizeArray
description: Array of two numbers representing [width, height].

name: isSingleSizeArray
description: Returns true if the given object is a {@link SingleSizeArray}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: toSize
description: Returns a {@link Size} instance from the {@link SingleSizeArray}.

unknown.tagValue:
{?Size} The {@link Size} instance or null if the object is not
a {@link SingleSizeArray}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to convert.

return.description:
The {@link Size} instance or null if the object is not
a {@link SingleSizeArray}.

name: isInteger
description: Returns true if the specified parameter is an integer.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the value is an integer.

params.name: n
params.description: The value to check

return.description: True if the value is an integer.

name: src/Size.js
Size
description: Size captures a two dimensional size.

params.name: width
params.description: The width

params.name: height
params.description: The height

name: isEmpty
description: Returns whether the {@link Size} is empty.

name: ceil
description: Truncates the width and height upward.

name: floor
description: Truncates the width and height downard.

name: src/SizeMapping.js
SizeMapping
description:
Each size mapping is an array of two elements: {@link SingleSizeArray} and
{@link GeneralSize}.

name: isSizeMapping
description: Returns true if the object is a {@link SizeMapping}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: src/SizeMappingArray.js
isSizeMappingArray
description: Returns true if the object is a {@link SizeMappingArray}.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to test

name: src/SizeMappingBuilder.js
SizeMappingBuilder
description:
Builder for size mapping specification objects. This builder is provided to
help easily construct size specifications.

name: addSize
description:
Adds a mapping from a {@link SingleSizeArray} representing the viewport to
{@link GeneralSize} representing the slot.

params.name: viewportSize
params.description: The size of the viewport for this mapping entry.

params.name: slotSize
params.description: The sizes of the slot for this mapping entry.

return.description: A reference to this builder.

name: build
description:
Builds a size map specification from the mappings added to this builder. If
any invalid mappings have been supplied, this method will return null.
Otherwise it returns a specification in the correct format to pass to
{@link Slot#defineSizeMapping()}. The behavior of the builder after
calling {@link SizeMappingBuilder#build} is undefined.

unknown.tagValue:
{?SizeMappingArray} The result built by this builder. Can be null
if invalid size mappings were supplied.

return.description:
The result built by this builder. Can be null
if invalid size mappings were supplied.

name: src/Slot.js
Slot
description: Slot is an object representing single ad slot on a page.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: Full path of the ad unit with the network code and unit code.

params.name: size
params.description:
Width and height of the added slot. This is the
size that is used in the ad request if no responsive size mapping is provided
or the size of the viewport is smaller than the smallest size provided in the mapping.

params.name: optDiv
params.description: ID of the div that will contain this ad unit.

params.name: instance
params.description: = 0] The instance count of the slot.

name: getName
description: Returns the name of the slot

return.description: Ad unit path.

name: getDefinedId
description: Returns the instance of the {@link Slot}.

return.description: The instance

name: getAdUnitPath
description: Returns the full path of the ad unit, with the network code and ad unit path.

return.description: Ad unit path.

name: getSlotElementId
description: Returns the id of the slot element provided when the {@link Slot} was defined.

return.description: Slot element id.
The list of enabled services.
The list of sizes.

name: getOutOfPage
description: Returns a flag indicating whether the {@link Slot} is out of the page.

name: getAttributeKeys
description:
Returns the list of attribute keys set on this slot. If you intend to see
the keys of service-level attributes inherited by this {@link Slot}, you have to
use the {@link PubAdsService#getAttributeKeys} API.

unknown.tagValue: {!Array<string>} Array of attribute keys. Ordering is undefined.

return.description: Array of attribute keys. Ordering is undefined.

name: get
description:
Returns the value for the AdSense attribute associated with the given key.
Note that if you intend to see service-level attributes inherited by this
slot, you have to use the {@link PubAdsService#get} API.

unknown.tagValue:
{?string} Current value for the attribute key, or null if the key
is not present.

params.name: key
params.description: Name of the attribute to look for.

return.description:
Current value for the attribute key, or null if the key
is not present.

name: set
description:
Sets a value for an AdSense attribute on a particular ad slot. This will
override any values set at the service level for this key. See the AdSense
Attributes for a list of available keys and values. Calling this method
more than once for the same key will override previously set values for
that key. All values must be set before any display call.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: key
params.description: The name of the attribute.

params.name: value
params.description: Attribute value.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.
The attribute map

name: getTargeting
description:
Returns a specific custom targeting parameter set on this slot.
Service-level targeting parameters are not included.

unknown.tagValue:
{!Array<string>} The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

params.name: key
params.description: The targeting key to look for.

return.description:
The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

name: setTargeting
description:
Sets a custom targeting parameter for this slot. Calling this method
multiple times for the same key will overwrite old values. Values set here
will overwrite targeting parameters set on service level. These keys are
defined in your {@link DFP} account.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: key
params.description: Targeting parameter key.

params.name: value
params.description: Targeting parameter value or array of values.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: getTargetingKeys
description:
Returns the list of all custom targeting keys set on this slot. Service-level
targeting keys are not included.

unknown.tagValue: {!Array<string>} Array of targeting keys. Ordering is undefined.

return.description: Array of targeting keys. Ordering is undefined.

name: getTargetingMap
description: Returns the current targeting key-value dictionary.

return.description: the targeting map.

name: clearTargeting
description: Clears all custom slot-level targeting parameters for this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: updateTargetingFromMap
description:
Sets custom targeting parameters for this passback slot, from a key:value
map in a JSON object. A badly formatted input will be rejected. This is the
same as calling @{link Slot#setTargeting} for all the key values
of the object. In case of overwriting, only the last value will be kept.
Values set here will overwrite targeting parameters set on service level.
These keys are defined in your {@link DFP} account.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: map
params.description: Targeting parameter key:value map.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: addService
description: Adds a service to this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: service
params.description: The service to be added.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: _removeServices
description: Removes all of the services from the slot.

name: getCategoryExclusions
description: Returns the ad category exclusion labels for this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {!Array<string>} The ad category exclusion labels for this slot.

return.description: The ad category exclusion labels for this slot.

name: setCategoryExclusion
description: Sets a slot-level ad category exclusion label on this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: categoryExclusion
params.description: The ad category exclusion label to add.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: clearCategoryExclusions
description: Clears all slot-level ad category exclusion labels for this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: defineSizeMapping
description: Sets an array of mappings from a minimum viewport size to slot size for this slot.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: sizeMapping
params.description:
Array of size mappings. You can use
{@link SizeMappingBuilder} to create it. Each size mapping is an array of two elements:
{@link SingleSizeArray} and {@link GeneralSize}.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

throws.description: Size mapping has to be an array

name: setClickUrl
description:
Sets the click URL to which users will be redirected after clicking on the
ad. The {@link DFP} servers still record a click even if the click URL is replaced,
but any landing page URL associated with the creative that is served is
overridden. Subsequent calls overwrite the value. This works only for
non-SRA requests

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The slot object on which the method was called.

params.name: value
params.description: The click URL to set.

return.description: The slot object on which the method was called.
The click URL

name: getResponseInformation
description:
Returns the ad response information. This is based on the last ad response
for the slot. If this is called when the slot has no ad, null will be
returned.

name: setCollapseEmptyDiv
description:
Sets whether the slot div should be hidden when there is no ad in the slot.
This overrides the service-level settings.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: collapse
params.description: Whether to collapse the slot if no ad is returned.

params.name: optCollapseBeforeAdFetch
params.description:
Whether to collapse the slot
even before an ad is fetched. Ignored if collapse is not true.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: getCollapseEmptyDiv
description: Returns whether the slot div should be hiddne when there is no ad in the slot.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true to collapse the slot if no ad is returned.

return.description: true to collapse the slot if no ad is returned.

name: setForceSafeFrame
description:
Configures whether ads in this slot should be forced to be rendered using
a SafeFrame container

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: forceSafeFrame
params.description:
true to force all ads in this slot to be
rendered in SafeFrames and false to opt-out of a page-level setting (if
present). Setting this to false when not specified at page-level, won't
change anything.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: setSafeFrameConfig
description:
Sets the slot-level preferences for SafeFrame configuration. Any unrecognized
keys in the config object will be ignored. The entire config will be ignored
if an invalid value is passed for a recognized key. These slot level
preferences, if specified, will override any page level preferences.

unknown.tagValue: {Slot} The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

params.name: config
params.description: The configuration object.

return.description: The {@link Slot} object on which the method was called.

name: fetchStarted
description: Informs the {@link Slot} that its fetch has started.

name: fetchEnded
description: Informs the {@link Slot} that its fetch has finished.

name: loaded
description: Informs the {@link Slot} that it has been loaded.

name: renderStarted
description: Informs the {@link Slot} that its rendering has started.

name: renderEnded
description: Informs the {@link Slot} that its rendering has finished.

params.name: responseInformation
params.description: The response information.

name: impressionViewable
description: Notifies the {@link Slot} that it's impression is viewable.

name: visibilityChanged
description: Notifies the {@link Slot} of its in view percentage.

params.name: inViewPercentage
params.description: The percentage (0-100) of the ad's area that is visible.

name: _setContent
description: Sets the content of the {@link Slot}.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to set; or null to clear the content.

name: _getContent
description: Gets the content of the slot {@link Slot}.

unknown.tagValue: {?string} The content of the slot; or null if the slot has no content.

return.description: The content of the slot; or null if the slot has no content.

name: src/SlotId.js
SlotId
description: The SlotId collects several identifiers for a Slot.

params.name: adUnitPath
params.description: The ad unit path of the slot.

params.name: instance
params.description: The instance number of the slot.

params.name: optDomId
params.description: The DOM ID of the slot.

return.description: The name of the {@link Slot}.
The AdUnitPath of the {@link Slot}.

name: getDomId
description: The DOM Id of the {@link Slot}.

unknown.tagValue: {string} The DOM Id of the {@link Slot}.

return.description: The DOM Id of the {@link Slot}.
The ID of the {@link Slot}.

name: getInstance
description: The instance number of the {@link Slot}.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The instance number of the {@link Slot}.

return.description: The instance number of the {@link Slot}.

name: toString
description: Converts the {@link SlotId} to a String.

return.description: A String representation.

set

params.name: key

name: get
description: Returns a specific targeting parameter that has been set.

unknown.tagValue:
{!Array<string>} The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

params.name: key
params.description: The targeting key to look for.

return.description:
The values associated with this key, or an empty
array if there is no such key.

name: keys

name: clear
description: Clears custom targeting parameters for a given key.

params.name: key
params.description: Targeting parameter key.

name: all

return.description: the targeting map.

name: src/events/ImpressionViewableEvent.js
ImpressionViewableEvent
description:
This event is fired when an impression becomes viewable, according to the
Active View criteria.

params.name: serviceName
params.description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot which contains the impression that became viewable.

name: serviceName
description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

name: slot
description: The slot which contains the impression that became viewable.

name: src/events/SlotOnloadEvent.js
SlotOnloadEvent
description:
This event is fired when the creative's iframe fires its load event. When
rendering rich media ads in sync rendering mode, no iframe is used so no
SlotOnLoadEvent will be fired.

params.name: serviceName
params.description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot in which the creative was loaded.

name: serviceName
description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

name: slot
description: The slot in which the creative was loaded.

name: src/events/SlotRenderEndedEvent.js
SlotRenderEndedEvent
description:
This event is fired when a slot on the page has finished rendering. The event
is fired by the service that rendered the slot. Example: To listen to
companion ads, add a listener to the companionAds service, not the pubads
service.

params.name: serviceName
params.description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot in which the creative was rendered.

params.name: creativeId
params.description:
Creative ID of the rendered ad. Value is null
for empty slots, backfill ads or creatives rendered by services other than pubads service.

params.name: lineItemId
params.description:
Line item ID of the rendered ad. Value is null
for empty slots, backfill ads or creatives rendered by services other than pubads service.

params.name: isEmpty
params.description: true if no ad was returned for the slot, false otherwise.

params.name: size
params.description:
Indicates the pixel size of the rendered
creative. Example: [728, 90]. Value is null for empty ad slots.

name: serviceName
description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

name: slot
description: The slot in which the creative was rendered.

name: creativeId
description:
Creative ID of the rendered ad. Value is null for empty slots, backfill ads
or creatives rendered by services other than pubads service.

name: isEmpty
description: true if no ad was returned for the slot, false otherwise.

name: lineItemId
description:
Line item ID of the rendered ad. Value is null for empty slots, backfill
ads or creatives rendered by services other than pubads service.

name: size
description:
Indicates the pixel size of the rendered creative. Example: [728, 90].
Value is null for empty ad slots.

name: src/events/SlotVisibilityChangedEvent.js
SlotVisibilityChangedEvent
description:
This event is fired whenever the on-screen percentage of an ad slot's area
changes. The event is throttled and will not fire more often than once every
200ms.

params.name: serviceName
params.description: Name of the service that owns the slot.

params.name: slot
params.description: The slot whose visibility changed.

params.name: inViewPercentage
params.description: The percentage (0-100) of the ad's area that is visible.

name: serviceName
description: Name of the service that rendered the slot.

name: slot
description: The slot which contains the impression that became viewable.

name: inViewPercentage
description: The percentage of the ad that is "in view".
